organizations: New York Racing Association and National Thoroughbred Racing Association
lead_paragraph: The sports agent Dwight Manley has resigned as the national manager of the Jockeys’ Guild after a year in the role. He was replaced by Terry Meyocks, a former official with the New York Racing Association and National Thoroughbred Racing Association.
